Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: ஒருபொழுதும் வாழ்வது அறியார் கருதுபகோடியும் அல்ல பல.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: Innumerable are the thoughts which occupy the mind of (the unwise), who know not that they shall live another moment.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A person sits making elaborate, long-term plans. Their mind is shown as a vast, chaotic workshop.
Layered_Composition.Midground: Inside this workshop, millions of fantastical, complex thought-bubbles ('கோடியும் அல்ல பல') are being furiously generated, representing their countless plans for the future.
Layered_Composition.Background: Unseen by the person, the fine, single thread of their life is about to be snipped by a cosmic pair of shears, representing the fact that they are not guaranteed even another moment of life ('ஒரு பொழுதும் வாழ்வது அறியார்'). The shears are closing in, just a fraction of a second away from cutting the thread.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: The profound folly of making millions of plans for the future when one does not even know if they will live for another moment.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The chaotic workshop of the mind contrasts with the simple, stark finality of the shears and thread. The sheer number and complexity of the plans highlight the foolishness of such elaborate thinking in the face of absolute uncertainty.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The mind-workshop is filled with a frantic, chaotic light. The cosmic shears are lit with a cold, impersonal, final light. The scene is tense with dramatic irony.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A shot that shows the busy planner in the foreground and, with a deep focus, the cosmic shears about to cut their life-thread in the background, creating tension.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, ultra-realistic, with complex and fantastical designs for the thought-bubbles.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: High-contrast lighting to separate the foolish, busy present from the stark, imminent finality.

Cultural_Anchors: Not knowing if one will live a moment (ஒரு பொழுதும் வாழ்வது அறியார்)
